entry: The ambient class ended - had more fun than I expected! I tend to psyche myself out on making music, but I ended up making a couple of pieces I really enjoy and discovered some things I didn't realize I was self conscious about. No new classes on the horizon - just gotta get through my current block of stuff!

Been a minute! I recently took a trip to Florida to see some family, took some interesting photos, and started a new art class through Polyphase. The last one was on designing simple websites with basic HTML and CSS, and this site was developed as a result of it! The new one is based on creating ambient music in ableton - it's been fun so far!
